findings.lower_chest: Bilateral lower lobe atelectasis. No pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdominal_findings.liver: Homogenous attenuation throughout; no focal lesions, no biliary dilatation.
abdominal_findings.pancreas: Normal attenuation; no focal lesions, no ductal dilatation, no peripancreatic stranding.
abdominal_findings.spleen: Normal size and attenuation; no focal lesions.
abdominal_findings.urinary: Normal and symmetric kidneys with a stable 1.3 cm left renal cyst; no focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis.

gastrointestinal.small_bowel: Normal caliber, wall thickness, and enhancement.
gastrointestinal.colon: Fat stranding and colonic wall thickening involving the transverse, descending, and sigmoid colon, unchanged to mildly worsened.

appendix.current_diameter: 1.6 cm with wall thickening and hyperemia.

previous_diameter.size: 1.3 cm without increased wall thickness or hyperenhancement.

findings.pelvis: Mild free fluid seen in pelvis, worse compared to prior.
findings.bones: No worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
findings.soft_tissues: Abdominal and pelvic wall within normal limits.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased diameter, thickening, and hyperemia of the appendix noted. Previous measurements were 1.0 cm and 1.3 cm without thickening.
